@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the Computational Tool schema for describing software and other computational tools for outbreak.info resources.
@graph.rdfs:label: ComputationalTool

@graph.rdfs:comment: Link to the source code repository of the tool.
@graph.rdfs:label: codeRepository

@graph.rdfs:comment: The main programming language(s) used to build or execute the tool. Please use terms from the ‘Programming language’ table in the Bio.Tools documentation
@graph.rdfs:label: programmingLanguage

@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the Person schema for describing authors and people for outbreak.info resources
@graph.rdfs:label: Person

familyName.description: Family name. In the U.S., the last name of an Person. This can be used along with givenName instead of the name property.

givenName.description: Given name. In the U.S., the first name of a Person. This can be used along with familyName instead of the name property.

affiliation.description: An organization that this person is affiliated with. For example, a school/university, a club, or a team.

orcid.description: the ORCID ID of the person

role.description: authorship, sponsorship, or other contribution role played by the person or organization in the creation of this resource

curationDate.description: The date this resource was added into outbreak.info, or was updated in outbreak.info.

@graph.rdfs:comment: the ORCID ID of the person
@graph.rdfs:label: orcid

@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the organization schema for describing authors, funders and other organizations referenced by outbreak.info resources
@graph.rdfs:label: Organization

alternateName.description: An alias or acronym for the organization.

affiliation.description: consortia or other organizations with which this organization is affiliated

class.description: A classification of the organization by a resource. Eg- for ClinicalTrials funders, it's [U.S. National Institutes of Health, Other U.S. Federal agencies, Industry, All others]

role.description: The role of an organization in its involvement with a resource

members.description: Members of this organization, team, or group

curationDate.description: The date this resource was added into outbreak.info, or was updated in outbreak.info.

alternateName.description: Alternate name or Acronym for the organization.

affiliation.description: consortia or other organizations with which this person is affiliated

@graph.rdfs:comment: consortia or other organizations with which this organization is affiliated
@graph.rdfs:label: affiliation

@graph.rdfs:comment: Members of this organization, team, or group
@graph.rdfs:label: members

@graph.rdfs:comment: A classification of the organization by a resource. Eg- for ClinicalTrials funders, it's [U.S. National Institutes of Health, Other U.S. Federal agencies, Industry, All others]
@graph.rdfs:label: class

@graph.rdfs:comment: authorship, sponsorship, or other contribution role played by the person or organization in the creation of this resource. In a Clinical Study/Trial ArmGroup, it's equivalent to the ArmType in ClinicalTrials.gov
@graph.rdfs:label: role

@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing the MonetaryGrant schema used for outbreak.info
@graph.rdfs:label: MonetaryGrant

name.description: The name of the grant or funding.

url.description: URL of the grant or funding award.

funder.description: The organization(s) that supported (sponsored) the grant through some kind of financial contribution.

recipient.description: The person or organization to whom or to which the grant was awarded

alternateName.description: Alternate name or Acronym for the organization.

affiliation.description: consortia or other organizations with which this person is affiliated

@graph.rdfs:comment: The person or organization to whom or to which the grant was awarded
@graph.rdfs:label: recipient

@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing the DataDownload schema used for outbreak.info.
@graph.rdfs:label: DataDownload

@graph.rdfs:comment: A citation object for a resource which is cited by the subject (ie- is a derivative of the subject), related to the subject, or from which the subject was based on (ie- is derived from).
@graph.rdfs:label: CitationObject

name.description: The name or title of the cited resource.

identifier.description: An identifier associated with the citation

citeText.description: The bibliographic citation for the referenced resource as is provided

versionDate.description: The version date of the resource used at the time of the creation of the citation as certain resources (protocols, datasets) may change frequently over time.

curationDate.description: The date this resource was added into outbreak.info, or was updated in outbreak.info.

@graph.rdfs:comment: The bibliographic citation for the referenced resource as is provided
@graph.rdfs:label: citeText

@graph.rdfs:comment: The version date of the resource used at the time of the creation of the citation as certain resources (protocols, datasets) may change frequently over time.
@graph.rdfs:label: versionDate

@graph.rdfs:comment: The type of resource. A stand-in property for the JSON-LD '@type'
@graph.rdfs:label: sourceType

@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing the Dataset schema used for outbreak.info.
@graph.rdfs:label: Dataset

@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing a Correction used for outbreak.info. A Correction is a specialized subclass of the CitationObject
@graph.rdfs:label: Correction

@graph.rdfs:comment: Type of notice or correction: (correction, retraction, expression of convern, withdrawal, erratum, update, correction/republication, preprint, peer reviewed version)
@graph.rdfs:label: correctionType

@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing the Publication used for outbreak.info
@graph.rdfs:label: Publication

@graph.rdfs:comment: The name of the journal (or publisher if journal name not available)
@graph.rdfs:label: journalName

@graph.rdfs:comment: abbreviated Journal Title (note, this should be autopopulated)
@graph.rdfs:label: journalNameAbbrevation

@graph.rdfs:comment: Volume number of journal in which the article was published
@graph.rdfs:label: volumeNumber

@graph.rdfs:comment: Issue of journal in which the article was published
@graph.rdfs:label: issueNumber

@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing an Analysis for inclusion in outbreak.info resources
@graph.rdfs:label: Analysis

identifier.description: An identifier for the analysis, preferably a doi

doi.description: The DOI of the analysis if available

url.description: URL where the analysis can be found

domainUrl.description: The domain name or main site on which webpage or specific url of the analysis can be found

datePublished.description: Date of first broadcast/publication of the analysis

dateModified.description: The date on which the CreativeWork was most recently modified or when the item's entry was modified within a DataFeed.

author.description: The author of this content or rating.

assumption.description: Statement of assumptions / limitations of the model

keywords.description: Keywords or tags used to describe this content. Multiple entries in a keywords list are typically delimited by commas.

analysisTechnique.description: A technique or technology used in a analysis

species.description: Species(es) for which the analysis has been performed

infectiousAgent.description: infectious agents(s) which are the focus of the analysis

infectiousDisease.description: The disease or medical conditions caused by the infectious agent. Important as some agents may cause multiple diseases

analysisTopic.description: The underlying question, goal, or aim of the analysis

funding.description: The funding that supported the creation or maintenance of the analysis

isBasedOn.description: Associated datasets, software, protocols, etc. used by the work described in this analysis, including reference publications

citedBy.description: A citation to a resource (eg- publication, protocol, etc.) which is derived from this analysis (stored as an object, not a string)

isRelatedTo.description: A citation to a resource (eg- publication, protocol, etc.) which is related to the analysis but is not a derivative nor was derived from the analysis (stored as an object, not a string)

curatedBy.description: The source from which this analysis was identified for inclusion into Outbreak.info. Provides provenance for a resource which was curated by another.

license.description: A license document that applies to this content, typically indicated by URL.

evaluations.description: Reviews, Ratings, or other types of evaluations on this resource

controlledVocabulary.definition: collection of vocabulary terms defined in ontologies

speciesControlledVocabulary.description: collection of vocabulary terms defined in ontologies

miscControlledVocabulary.description: collection of vocabulary terms defined in ontologies

moreControlledVocabulary.definition: collection of vocabulary terms defined in ontologies

diseaseVocabulary.description: collection of vocabulary terms defined in ontologies

baseOrgObject.description: A barebones Organization object to work around recursion issues in DDE

alternateName.description: Alternate name or Acronym for the organization.

curationDate.description: The date this resource was added into outbreak.info, or was updated in outbreak.info.

memberObject.description: Reusable person definition accounting for recursion issues in DDE

curationDate.description: The date this resource was added into outbreak.info, or was updated in outbreak.info.

name.description: The name of the monetary grant that funded/funds the analysis

identifier.description: Unique identifier(s) for the grant(s) used to fund the analysis

citation.description: A citation object for a resource which is cited by the analysis (ie- is a derivative of the publication) , related to the analysis, or from which the analysis was based on (ie- is derived from).

name.description: Name of or title of the citation

identifier.description: An identifier associated with the citation

url.description: The url of the resource cited.

versionDate.description: The version date of the resource used at the time of the creation of the citation as certain resources (protocols, datasets) may change frequently over time.

citeText.description: The bibliographic citation for the referenced resource as is provided

curationDate.description: The date this resource was added into outbreak.info, or was updated in outbreak.info.

reviewObject.description: A review or descriptive evaluation of the resource

reviewAspect.description: This Review or Rating is relevant to this part or facet of the itemReviewed

reviewBody.description: The actual body of the review.

reviewRating.description: The rating given in this review

author.description: The author of this content or rating.

ratingObject.description: A rating or categorical evaluation of the resource

reviewAspect.description: This Review or Rating is relevant to this part or facet of the itemReviewed

author.description: The author of this content or rating.

aggregateRatingObject.description: A cumulative evaluation of the resource

name.description: The name of the aggregate rating

reviewAspect.description: This Review or Rating is relevant to this part or facet of the itemReviewed

author.description: The author of this content or rating.

@graph.rdfs:comment: The domain name or main site on which webpage or specific url can be found
@graph.rdfs:label: domainUrl

@graph.rdfs:comment: Statement of assumptions / limitations of the model
@graph.rdfs:label: assumption

@graph.rdfs:comment: A technique or technology used in a analysis
@graph.rdfs:label: analysisTechnique

@graph.rdfs:comment: The underlying question, goal, or aim of the analysis
@graph.rdfs:label: analysisTopic

@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing a reagent, material, sample, or some other product used in a protocol resource in outbreak.info
@graph.rdfs:label: Product

@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing an instrument used in a protocol resource listed in outbreak.info
@graph.rdfs:label: Instrument

@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing the Protocols for outbreak.info Resources.
@graph.rdfs:label: Protocol

@graph.rdfs:comment: Precautions, warnings, and/or safety warnings associated with or highlighted by the protocol
@graph.rdfs:label: warning

@graph.rdfs:comment: statement of what was updated/changed since prior version
@graph.rdfs:label: correctionNote

@graph.rdfs:comment: The status of the protocol
@graph.rdfs:label: protocolStatus

@graph.rdfs:comment: A laboratory equipment use by a person to follow one or more steps described in this Protocol
@graph.rdfs:label: instrument

@graph.rdfs:comment: The type of 'protocol' based on setting in which it would apply
@graph.rdfs:label: protocolSetting

@graph.rdfs:comment: The type of 'protocol' based on degree of specificity and purpose
@graph.rdfs:label: protocolCategory

@graph.rdfs:comment: Type of evidence/data generated by the protocol
@graph.rdfs:label: usedToGenerate

@graph.rdfs:comment: Guidelines or Standards to which these protocols adhere. ie- GMP, GCP, other EQUATOR guidelines. Useful for selecting protocols where certain standards/guidelines must be met
@graph.rdfs:label: inComplianceWith

@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing StudyEvents, a class that describes categorical events in Clinical Trials added to outbreak.info
@graph.rdfs:label: StudyEvent

@graph.rdfs:comment: Type of the event status such as StudyStart, PrimaryCompletion, Completion, StudyFirstSubmit, StudyFirstSubmitQC, LastUpdateSubmit
@graph.rdfs:label: studyEventType

@graph.rdfs:comment: The corresponding/actual date of the study event (ie- the StartDate, Primary CompletionDate, CompletionDate, StudyFirstSubmitDate, StudyFirstSubmitQCDate, LastUpdateSubmitDate)
@graph.rdfs:label: studyEventDate

@graph.rdfs:comment: the type of date provided (actual, anticipated, or estimated)
@graph.rdfs:label: studyEventDateType

@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing the status of a ClinicalTrial resource in outbreak.info
@graph.rdfs:label: StudyStatus

@graph.rdfs:comment: The recruitment status of the study
@graph.rdfs:label: status

@graph.rdfs:comment: Flag for whether or not the study has expanded Access status
@graph.rdfs:label: statusExpandedAccess

@graph.rdfs:comment: The date that the status was verified. Equivalent to NCT's StatusVerifiedDate
@graph.rdfs:label: statusDate

@graph.rdfs:comment: The number of participants enrolled in the study
@graph.rdfs:label: enrollmentCount

@graph.rdfs:comment: The type of estimation used to determine the enrollmentCount (actual counts, target size, etc.)
@graph.rdfs:label: enrollmentType

@graph.rdfs:comment: A brief explanation of the reason(s) why such clinical study was stopped (for a clinical study that is Suspended, Terminated, or Withdrawn prior to its planned completion as anticipated by the protocol)
@graph.rdfs:label: whyStopped

@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing the study design of a clinical trial/study for inclusion into outbreak.info resources
@graph.rdfs:label: StudyDesign

@graph.rdfs:comment: Type of human study, can be subtypes of observational study or interventional studies and may include the temporal relationship of observation period to time of participant enrollment.
@graph.rdfs:label: studyType

@graph.rdfs:comment: Stage or phase of the study in the U.S. if applicable
@graph.rdfs:label: phase

@graph.rdfs:comment: The number of the phase or stage of the study
@graph.rdfs:label: phaseNumber

@graph.rdfs:comment: The method by which the study participants were allocated into groups
@graph.rdfs:label: designAllocation

@graph.rdfs:comment: The general design of the strategy for assigning interventions to participants in a clinical intervention study OR the general design of the strategy for identifying and following up with participants during an observational study
@graph.rdfs:label: designModel

@graph.rdfs:comment: The primary purpose of the study
@graph.rdfs:label: designPrimaryPurpose

@graph.rdfs:comment: The people who do not know which participants have been assigned to which interventions
@graph.rdfs:label: designWhoMasked

@graph.rdfs:comment: String description of the study design if structured information not available
@graph.rdfs:label: designStudyText

@graph.rdfs:comment: a schema to describe Interventions discussed in Clinical Studies/Trials for inclusion in outbreak.info Resources
@graph.rdfs:label: Intervention

@graph.rdfs:comment: The category of an intervention in the study
@graph.rdfs:label: category

@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing arm groups in clinical studies/trials for inclusion in outbreak.info Resources
@graph.rdfs:label: ArmGroup

@graph.rdfs:comment: The interventions (if any) in this ArmGroup
@graph.rdfs:label: intervention

@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing a Clinical Trial/Study Outcome for inclusion in  outbreak.info Resources
@graph.rdfs:label: Outcome

@graph.rdfs:comment: The outcome measure for the study
@graph.rdfs:label: outcomeMeasure

@graph.rdfs:comment: The specific time point(s) and overall duration of evaluation must be specified in this section
@graph.rdfs:label: outcomeTimeFrame

@graph.rdfs:comment: The classification of the outcome measure as either primary, secondary, or exploratory
@graph.rdfs:label: outcomeType

@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing information about Clinical Trials/Studies eligibility criteria for inclusion in outbreak.info Resources
@graph.rdfs:label: Eligibility

@graph.rdfs:comment: "criteria for inclusion in the study
@graph.rdfs:label: inclusionCriteria

@graph.rdfs:comment: the minimum age for a participant to be included in the study
@graph.rdfs:label: minimumAge

@graph.rdfs:comment: the maximum age for a participant to be included in the study
@graph.rdfs:label: maximumAge

@graph.rdfs:comment: the sex requirement to be included in the study
@graph.rdfs:label: gender

@graph.rdfs:comment: Boolean for whether or not participation is based on gender
@graph.rdfs:label: genderBased

@graph.rdfs:comment: Boolean to indicate whether or not healthy volunteers may be included in the study
@graph.rdfs:label: healthyVolunteers

@graph.rdfs:comment: the age category of a participant to be included in the study if a minimum and maximum age is not specified
@graph.rdfs:label: stdAge

@graph.rdfs:comment: criteria for exclusion from the study
@graph.rdfs:label: exclusionCriteria

@graph.rdfs:comment: The descriptive criteria as published for the Clinical Trial
@graph.rdfs:label: criteriaText

@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing Clinical Trial/Study locations for inclusion in outbreak.info Resources
@graph.rdfs:label: StudyLocation

@graph.rdfs:comment: The location of the study
@graph.rdfs:label: studyLocation

@graph.rdfs:comment: The city in which the facility used for the study is located
@graph.rdfs:label: studyLocationCity

@graph.rdfs:comment: The state or province in which the facility used for the study is located
@graph.rdfs:label: studyLocationState

@graph.rdfs:comment: The country in which the facility used for the study is located
@graph.rdfs:label: studyLocationCountry

@graph.rdfs:comment: The recruitment status of the study at the specific study site
@graph.rdfs:label: studyLocationStatus

@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing the Clinical Trials and other medical studies used for outbreak.info Resources
@graph.rdfs:label: ClinicalTrial

@graph.rdfs:comment: Source of identifier assignment or type of identifier (NCTid, China CTRid, EudraCT Number, etc.)
@graph.rdfs:label: identifierSource

@graph.rdfs:comment: The type of date. Equivalent to NCT's LastUpdatePostDateType
@graph.rdfs:label: dateModifiedType

@graph.rdfs:comment: Ontological or controlled vocabulary identifier for the health condition or disease
@graph.rdfs:label: healthConditionIdentifier

@graph.rdfs:comment: Boolean for if the clinical trial has published any results
@graph.rdfs:label: hasResults

@graph.rdfs:comment: an event status such as StudyStart, PrimaryCompletion, Completion, StudyFirstSubmit, StudyFirstSubmitQC, LastUpdateSubmit
@graph.rdfs:label: studyEvent

@graph.rdfs:comment: The status of the study
@graph.rdfs:label: studyStatus

@graph.rdfs:comment: The general design of the study
@graph.rdfs:label: studyDesign

@graph.rdfs:comment: The arm or factor of an interventional study
@graph.rdfs:label: armGroup

@graph.rdfs:comment: The arm or factor of an interventional study
@graph.rdfs:label: outcome

@graph.rdfs:comment: eligibility criteria
@graph.rdfs:label: eligibilityCriteria

@graph.rdfs:comment: The author of this resource, content, or rating
@graph.rdfs:label: author

@graph.rdfs:comment: Date the record was created
@graph.rdfs:label: dateCreated

@graph.rdfs:comment: Date of first broadcast/publication
@graph.rdfs:label: datePublished

@graph.rdfs:comment: The date on which the CreativeWork was most recently modified or when the item's entry was modified within a DataFeed
@graph.rdfs:label: dateModified

@graph.rdfs:comment: keywords for describing the record
@graph.rdfs:label: keywords

@graph.rdfs:comment: A short descriptive summary of the publication or study
@graph.rdfs:label: abstract

@graph.rdfs:comment: A pubmed identifier if available
@graph.rdfs:label: pmid

@graph.rdfs:comment: A doi if available
@graph.rdfs:label: doi

@graph.rdfs:comment: Funding that supports (sponsors) the collection of this dataset through some kind of financial contribution
@graph.rdfs:label: funding

@graph.rdfs:comment: A technique or technology used in this resource
@graph.rdfs:label: measurementTechnique

@graph.rdfs:comment: Species(es) from which dataset has been collected
@graph.rdfs:label: species

@graph.rdfs:comment: infectious agents(s) which are the focus of the dataset
@graph.rdfs:label: infectiousAgent

@graph.rdfs:comment: The disease or medical conditions caused by the infectious agent. Important as some agents may cause multiple diseases
@graph.rdfs:label: infectiousDisease

@graph.rdfs:comment: Applicable outbreak.info category
@graph.rdfs:label: topicCategory

@graph.rdfs:comment: A citation to a resource (eg- publication, protocol, etc.) on which this resource was derived (stored as an object, not a string)
@graph.rdfs:label: isBasedOn

@graph.rdfs:comment: A citation to a resource (eg- publication, protocol, etc.) which is related to the resource but is not a derivative nor was derived from the resource (stored as an object, not a string)
@graph.rdfs:label: isRelatedTo

@graph.rdfs:comment: A citation to a resource (eg- publication, protocol, etc.) which is derived from this resource (stored as an object, not a string)
@graph.rdfs:label: citedBy

@graph.rdfs:comment: The source from which this Dataset was identified for inclusion into Outbreak.info. Provides provenance for a resource which was curated by another.
@graph.rdfs:label: curatedBy

@graph.rdfs:comment: The date this resource was added into outbreak.info, or was updated in outbreak.info.
@graph.rdfs:label: curationDate

@graph.rdfs:comment: One or more reviews, ratings, or other evaluations of this resource
@graph.rdfs:label: evaluations
